title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 628 - Child Care and Foster Care Reimbursement Claiming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 628 - Child Care and Foster Care Reimbursement Claiming

State Regulations
§ 628.1 - Reimbursement for child care, including foster care and adoption assistance
§ 628.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for foster care
§ 628.3 - Classifications of child care reimbursement claiming

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 628

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 131, 153, 153-d, 153-e, 344, 358-a, 358-b, 398-a, 407, 409-b, 410[1], 410-c, 410-u--410-z, 432, 445, 456

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
